fiveStarReviews.reviewText: Jason and his crew replaced our water heater a few weeks ago. The unit is performing perfectly since it was installed. They came the same day I called and did the work for a very reasonable price.

I was looking for a good honest plumber and Jason had some really good reviews so we gave him a try and he lived up to those reviews.  He worked us in quickly, communicated when he was running a little behind.  Jason and his crew were very friendly and professional, got the job done and the price was reasonable!

Jason's Drain Service did some work on our older home that included replacing a drain pipe under the house and installing a new pressure control valve. Jason Hunter and his team were friendly, professional and did a great job. If you are looking for a true professional with over 30 years experience who will show up when he promises and get your job done efficiently, give Jason a call. I will definitely call him again when needed.

I called Jason Drain service due to a slowly draining kitchen sink. Sadly, it is a major problem that we won't get fixed until we absolutely have no choice but to do so, in the future. This is at a house that we just bought in another neighborhood. Anyway, Jason and his partner were just the best!!!   Unrelated to drains, my husband was trying to pick at a mound of concrete that the former owners poured onto the driveway. They got out their jack hammer like tool and helped him out before they left.

I recently used Jason’s Drain Service for 2 jobs.   Don’t let the name fool you, they do much more than drains. They replaced a hot water heater (job 1) and replaced the cartridges in both of my bathtub faucets (job 2).  Both faucets are working perfectly now and we have plenty of hot water. Their pricing is reasonable.

However, the best thing about them is their willingness to work with your schedule and punctuality. For both jobs, I asked them to come on a specific date. They can on the date requested and were here shortly after 8:00.  This is a drastic change from my previous plumber who was totally unreliable.

Jason also did not mind me standing over his shoulder and asking questions. He even stayed a couple of extra minutes to make sure that one faucet stopped dripping.

His prices are reasonable.  He is *extremely* fair with his pricing.

He is also very helpful with general information without charging for just a 5 minute conversation.

EDIT: I just used him for a third job.  He again was very punctual which was amazing given we are in the middle of a very hard freeze.  His price for today's job was more than fair.

I highly recommend Jason’s Drain Service.
Did great and quick work on a leak I had outside going under the sidewalk. Thanks!
Honest, quick, and great pricing!
Excellent and trustworthy service. Highly recommend.

This is the plumber I've been looking for all these years. For real, Jason's drain was the 6th plumber I tried. Some of the others were bad, some were alright, but Jason was the only one that was great. It is such a relief to finally find a plumber I can trust and rely on. Thank you Jason!
He had great communication skills and got to my job in a very prompt manner. Perfect work and very reasonable price. Would not hesitate to use him again. 7 out of 5 stars.
These guys are great. Very professional, reasonable price, on time, quick and clean. If needed will definitely use again!

I was very happy that I called  Jason drain service. A very  professional  service. I am well pleased with the service that was given. Jason is a very nice kind person and I recommend this business. Thanks Jason.

Very straightforward and trustworthy... You can leave them in the house and go. Would recommend to faily and friends. A+

He has done work on the interior and exterior of our older house, AND has upgraded fixtures for us. We couldn't be happier. I've seen a few bad reviews from people based on their "home warranty" and their repair not being covered.  Whether you dispatch a plumber, electrician, or AC specialist, they can only cover items that your home warranty company lets them cover, based on your contract (that you picked).  People should read their contracts first before taking their frustrations out on a local business.  Cheaper home warranties cover less items, go figure.

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: Chris and an assistant came to my home the day I called Delta Plumbing and made every effort to detect the source of a sewer-type odor we have smelled for the past several days in just one bathroom.  He was professional in his approach to finding it though he was unable to detect the source.  He recommended a smoke test and provided a written estimate of $550 for the first 2 hours, saying he was sure it would take less than that time to do the test.

Scott was extremely helpful, quick and reported back on his work and included photos throughout the process.  The pricing was reasonable and the work was completed on-time and within the quoted rates.  I would definitely recommend this company and would hire Scott to do additional work when needed!  Thank you!
Mr. Anthony  was patient and very helpful. This was a great experience thanks to him. Thanks Anthony!

Had a water leak in our front yard discovered late yesterday afternoon. It was slight, or so it seemed, so I waited until this morning to find a plumber.
Used Delta's online appointment scheduler early this morning, given that they replaced our HW Heater a few years ago. Evelyn called me at 8a to let me know that someone would be out asap to take a look.

Anthony showed up around 915, took a quick look at things and got to work digging where the leak was springing from. After about 2.5 hours he was all done. Great customer service, clearly explained the issue and solution and quickly made the repair. Thankful for companies like Delta! Thanks again Anthony.
William showed up on time and got the job done.....thank you Will
Scott was very knowledgeable and pleasant when he arrived.
Nathan is the best and the greatest plumber I ever work with.  Thanks Nathan
Scott was great on time came did my estimate and diagnostic explained everything in detail despite I have been a mess since this leak .
Trace Morgan arrived onsite on time as promised and was very professional. He kept me informed through out his inspection!
Delta Plumbing and our plumber Nathan did an excellent job!  Nathan was professional and knowledable. I would definately recommend!
I Greatly Appreciate the Customer Service and Education on Septic and plumbing Equipment..

What an awesome experience. In the process of selling my father's home and didn't know it had a septic tank as opposed to a public sewer system. I was told that any plumbing service could inspect and provide the clearance letter needed for selling the home. Thanks to my realtor for doing the leg work and calling different plumbing companies, he gave me Delta's number, and because I had used them in the past I felt comfortable scheduling the inspection for my father's home.

Calling and speaking with Ms. Opal to set up the appointment went without a hitch as she was so very courteous and took the time to answer my questions and was very detailed in the information that she needed as well as the work that would be performed. She even sent a follow up email to let me know that she received my signed authorization form that I emailed back to her....I didn't even have to call and ask....WOW.

The pleasant experience didn't stop there, Mr. Trace called me once he arrived to the property and then called me back to let me know the results of the inspection. Because I was out of town taking care of my mother, Mr. Trace could have told me anything, but yet he was honest to confirm that the tank was in very good condition and didn't need any service.

Thank you to both Ms. Opal and Mr. Trace for your awesome customer service, your attention to detail, and keeping the customer top of mind!! Awesome!
Very courteous and knowledgeable when explaining the issues and resolves where possible. Thank you Jerry
Anthony was a pleasure to work with. Very informative and took the time to diagnose and determine the best path forward. Would hire again, no issues!

Ivan was incredible!  What looked like it should be an easy task ended up being alot more complicated.  After attempting a variety of options, he settled on the best one to achieve my request.  He was fantastic.  I highly recommend Ivan.  If I need anything in the future, I will request Ivan.  Thank you Ivan!

AWESOME AWESOME........ Jacob & Delta Plumbing are 5 star plus in my book.   We had a serious plumbing and called Delta and they were here very quickly since it was an emergency and we didn't want out brand new floor and bathroom ruined because of the back up that was caused from 64 year old cast iorn pipes rusting and breaking apart.    They were here 2 days assessing the job, was here early in the day Wednesday and started the job.  Every piece of dirt was put back into place.....lol .......and the made special care of not tearing up a new baby tree that had just been planted recently.  They doubled checked the water to make sure it was running threw the new pipes properly, had me run water threw the washing machine several times so that everything was flowing correctly and not backing up again.  The speediness and care they gave me was top notch.  Everything they had to do or needed to do they told me first and asked if i wanted to do it and yes we did it.  And I couldn't be happier.  In the past we have used several different plumbers but no one has ever taken the time to explain everything to us and give us the option as to what we wanted to do, and give me the respect I deserve being that its our house and our money.  No pressure or pushing us into a decision we needed to think about it and go over with him on.   I totally recommend Delta Plumbing for any and all plumbing problems they would be the one's I'd call and "will" call.  Thank you Jacob for your help, your kindness and concern of what could have happened in the very near future had we not had all those pipes replaced.  Thank you Delta
Great guys and they were flexible on the price.  For sure, they will be the first company I call next time!
Jimmy J did a wonderful job for me. I needed a snake for my toilet and he was great
Professional service with fair prices. I am a Delta Plumbing happy customer, thanks to Service Pro, Anthony Day!! Thanks Guys!!
Great service and really fast William was really great

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: Antwon the owner did an amazing job. He was prompt and very knowledgeable. He not only called right back, but he also charged exactly what he quoted. I was also pleased with his invoicing system. I received an invoice along with a detailed breakdown and picture of my services rendered. I definitely recommend and will use Glory plumbing again.

High quality, prompt, and professional service that I highly recommend.

Antwon and his team arrived to my home early, and quickly got to work assessing the problem we had with two malfunctioning faucets and fixing it.  He even checked to make sure our water pressure was at the recommended levels to preempt any future issues.  All for an affordable price.

If your husband is like me, handy but really better at making temporary fixes until you can find a long term solution, then call Glory Plumbing and get them scheduled for a visit.  They'll get you squared away.
Love his work..Accurate,Knowledgeable and got the job done for a good price..5 ⭐️

This company is highly recommended. They came out in less than hour for an emergency plumbing service call after business hours. Antwon was very professional and explained everything to us and provided a detailed invoice before the work was done. He was fast, proficient and his work is very neat! He is now one of our preferred Service Pros.

Antwuan was very very VERY professional and took care of my water leak issues. He squeezed me into his busy day in such short notice and went above and beyond to tend the services that was needed. I highly recommend his services to anyone in need of any plumbing related issues. Thank you!!!!!!!!!
He was fast,professional,and very informative about the job and process.Great Job! I recommend to anyone with a plumbing problem.
He was very professional. He finished at a timely fashion. It’s very hard trying to find a reasonable plumber. I feel he is a very fair plumber!

Listen... I can not say enough about how pleased, impressed and THANKFUL I am for this company!! Antwon and young man assisting him worked well into two nights to assure that my mother had running water, after extremely frigid weather caused pipes to bust. He didn't just patch it up, he thoroughly fixed the problems, explaining everything along the way!! Kind, courteous and very professional!!  I highly recommend this company!!$$
This company is the BEST!!! Very professional, very clean, and very fast. He came in same day repaired a broken toilet and flange. He is the best in town!!!! HANDS DOWN!!!!

Antwon helped us remodel our bathroom. We hired him after our initial contractor made a mess of the plumbing install, and he was communicative, patient, and thorough. He is trustworthy, kind and skilled as a plumber, and we are grateful to have worked with him! We will hire him again next time we need a plumber.

This is one of the best Plummer by Far. If he gives you a time trust me he's on point. His work is very professional and he does a great job. And don't mind explaining any questions you might have. I don't know about most people but being a home owner it's hard to find a professional Plummer. My search is over he is the real deal 💯

I had previously used Glory Drain and they did a great job! When I called this time, they were once again prompt, professional and complete the job in a timely manner. I will definitely use them again if needed!

Glory Drain is superb in every way. As accidents go, I experienced a plumbing mishap late on a Friday night. It got a bit more complex given that it might have been linked to a previous repair by the city. GD not only reached my home within an hour of notice, they stuck with us until the city came out and did its due diligence a few days later.  If you are looking for excellent service and pride of ownership, Glory Drain is the company for you.

The last company made a quick fix to stop our kitchen sink from clogging, but it came back and this company was referred to me.  They explained the issue, costs and made repairs in a timely manner.  They’re thorough.

I had a leak in front yard starting to flood out my basement.  The local city utilities company had ancient pipes with shut off I couldn't find. Glory Drain was there within an hour to shut it off.   My insurance sent there plumber out they did work then it started to leak.  We were fed up and ready to replace the service line. Glory Drain was the only estimate we could afford.   They came out the very next day and finished in less than 5 hours.   They even helped me apply to utility company to get a credit back for water lost from the leak.   Glory Drain Cleaning Services will be the only plumber I will call.
Great work and nice attitude

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: We had a plumbing emergency on Sunday of a holiday weekend. Everyone we called either didn’t answer, or didn’t want to come. Joey from JW Plumbing answered right away, was super polite, AND was pulling in our driveway not long after we talked over the phone. He took care of the issue in no time, and his rates are great. I cannot recommend JW Plumbing enough. Joey - thank you so much for everything!!

Mr. Lawson was able to come out quick and fixed our issue with ease. Perfect man to call for fast, efficient plumbing work at a reasonable cost.
(Also his responses to 1 star comments are hilarious)
I know who I’ll be contacting with any plumbing needs from now on. Jeremy was detailed, honest and thorough in his work and at a fair price. 10/10 recommend!!
I’ve used Lawson Plumbing twice and both times I got quick service, with everything fixed to my satisfaction.

Jeremy came late in the evening and found why the sink and shower were backing up. A temporary solution was set up with plans to come back on Saturday. He was very knowledgeable and a pleasure to have service our home.

We called JW Lawson Plumbing Tuesday evening and Jeremy came the next day to help with an outside water meter issue. He was able to identify it within a few minutes and fix the problem. He’s very knowledgeable and a Great Plumber!  We are so very happy he was able to help us so quickly and will definitely keep his number for all plumbing related issues going forward. Thank you Jeremy!!

Lawson Plumbing will be my go-to for any and all future plumbing needs. Jeremy came out on a Sunday morning, was very professional and courteous, charged a fair price, and did excellent work in a timely manner. Will use again.

I highly recommend JW plumbing. Jeremy came and fixed what I screwed up and was professional and did a great job. He also fixed something that wasn’t done correctly when my house was built. Fair priced exceptional service.

Cut to the chase, I am so glad I made this call because Jeremy was very timely in his response and in getting the job done. Very knowledgeable and professional with competitive pricing. Definitely our  go-to now for any future plumbing needs. Very highly recommend. 10 stars

Jeremy was absolutely amazing and affordable. He is recommended 10/10 in our book. He works quickly gets to the problem and repairs it within the hour if he is available. Thank you for your great customer service Jeremy!

I had a completely clogged drain im my bathtub. Jeremy arrived early, which was great,  as I had to go to work in a few hours after appointment time. This was my 3rd time using this company. Jeremy responded very quickly on a Sunday regarding a water pressure problem we were having. He came out the same day and checked it out and said he would be back on Monday or Tuesday to finish. He was back on Tuesday to finish the job.

Jeremy is a great guy and a pleasure to deal with. He’s a consummate professional in everything he’s done for us. I couldn’t recommend him more highly. Does what he say when he says and does it well. If you need plumbing or pipe fitting you can stop looking, this is the guy.
Came out quickly to handle a water leak at my house. Excellent service.

We were having issues getting a new Dishwasher put in after having one for over 18 years.   My husband tried and tried and did his best.   He could not get it in and hooked up. I said babe just stop. I was in tears and found Jeremy and called him about what was going on late in the afternoon and cried on the phone with him. I had had enough.   He was at my home around 6 that same day.  I did not expect that.  He had to redo the plumbing for the dishwasher as it was all wrong and had to take out the wood floor there to get the new one to fit.  The newer dishwashers are way different then the old ones.   It was so a relief having this young man come to our aide.   I will call him for future plumbing issues and will recommend him to others as well.   Thank you for being "Jeremy on the spot forget about Johnny on the spot you are Jeremy on the spot.  God Bless you and keep you.  Thomas and Katrina  Hayden, Alabama.

J. W. Lawson was actually my third call. The first 2 on a Google search, one, I left a message and never got a return call. The 2nd number was disconnected. Jeremy answered promptly. I let him know I was calling for my 85 yr old Mom and I was 100 miles away. Her kitchen sink was stopped up. Jeremy let me know he didn't have his schedule set for the day but would call my Mom and text me when he was heading to my Mom's house. I received a text at 11:36am and an hour later problem was taken care of. It's nice to know that someone with integrity is there to help in time of need. If another plumbing problem arises, I will certainly call J.W. Lawson Plumbing again.

I called on Friday afternoon due to not wanting to drain out of the washer. My husband checked the piping downstairs and discovered that one joint had come completely unsealed and was also leaking into the basement. Jeremy said he would be here the next morning. Not only was he on time, he was actually a bit early. He immediately got to work. He thought initially the septic tank might need pumped, however, on further inspection,  the pipe in the basement had come loose from what was holding it up properly and was now sitting at a downward angle. It wasn't allowing everything to pass through and thus there was a huge clog. Jeremy soon had everything cleaned out, that section of pipe replaced and resealed, and mounted back to the wall properly. He was extremely professional, courteous and I will most definitely call him again should I need anything in the future.
Thank you Jeremy!

Jeremy responded very quickly to my emergency blown pipe problem caused by another plumber that wouldn't answer the phone on Saturday. I highly recommend this company without a doubt!!

Jeremy and his team were great! I called and they came out the same day and took care of my problem quickly and efficiently. They cleaned up everything and didn't leave any messes, made sure I was happy with the outcome and for a good price. Highly recommend and would use again in the future!

Jeremy and his team do great work. Quick to respond, fair quote, did excellent work and went above and beyond to make sure the job was done right. Also, work very clean and don’t leave a mess after the project is complete. Would highlight recommend!

Great service combined with professionalism; helped me save on not only water bill but electric too! Was so well informed about the ins and outs of this house and was gracious to share his knowledge and expertise! I highly recommend Jeremy and his company!

Called on a Friday evening and he not only answered the phone but he came out and fixed it!! Amazing service!! Amazing price!! Very professional, very nice! Cannot say enough good things about them!! If you're looking for a good plumber, you've found one!!!

Jeremy is a super nice guy. He was informative and helpful while repairing our kitchen faucet... he explained the problem thoroughly and told us how to repair should it happen again.

finalWebsiteData.aboutUs: Hatcher Plumbing is a premier plumbing service provider in Madison, Alabama, and the surrounding areas. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in comprehensive plumbing solutions, from water heater replacements and system revamps to general repairs. With a deep commitment to excellence and a focus on local service, we strive to deliver top-notch workmanship tailored to the unique needs of our community.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Unparalleled expertise and reliable service for all your plumbing needs in the Madison area.
sellingPoints: State-certified plumbers with extensive knowledge and experience in residential and commercial plumbing systems.
Prompt and efficient service, ensuring your plumbing issues are resolved quickly and professionally.
Commitment to using high-quality materials and adhering to industry best practices for long-lasting solutions.

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: This review is about the owner. I called about an issue we were having and the owner informed me he was out of town with family and the rest of his team was booked, but he gave me the names of 3 other plumbers he recommends.  He could have just said he was unavailable and ended the call, but he still tried to help. That level of professionalism should be the norm, but sadly, is not. It was probably a small thing to him, but meant a lot to me.

We used Hatcher plumbing for a total revamp of our 1960’s house’s plumbing. He gutted the old drains and replaced all of the cast iron with a completely redesigned pvc drain system all the way to the septic tank.  He designed a new vent system so that no pipes would show up through the roof sections at the front of the house. He also created a new water supply system throughout the house using PEX. He even replaced some pvc on our pool pump! Sims gave a lot of great advice along the way and helped us overcome several obstacles in our remodeling. We will be having him return shortly to hook up all of the fixtures as soon as the drywall is complete. Sims is very personable and passionate about doing quality work.  Hatcher Plumbing has done us a fantastic service!
Very professional and quality work! If you want a bad plumber Mr. Hatcher ain't it. Hes a good plumber with good work ethic, I definitely recommend him!
Great service

finalWebsiteData.aboutUs: With over 52 years of combined experience, Hobbs Plumbing LLC is Auburn's premier plumbing service provider. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in all aspects of plumbing repairs, services, and remodels, including maintenance contracts, sewer camera services, jetting, leak detection, and no-dig sewer repairs. Serving the Auburn area and surrounding Lee County, we take pride in our local expertise and commitment to delivering exceptional workmanship.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing partner dedicated to delivering efficient, high-quality solutions tailored to your needs.
sellingPoints: Prompt and reliable service from a team of highly trained and certified plumbing professionals.
Comprehensive range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance to complex remodels and specialized solutions like sewer camera inspections and no-dig sewer repairs.
Commitment to customer satisfaction, ensuring every job is completed with precision, attention to detail, and a focus on your long-term plumbing needs.

They also went above and beyond by helping me find someone who could do some flooring work, after several failed attempts from myself to get the work done.

Blake, Wade and Brittany are the best!

Very Professional and Very nice people!

Answered all my concerns, fixed all issues and disposed of old materials.

What a great Plumbing Company!

Thanks to you all at Hobbs Plumping.

Extremely pleased with our experience!  We needed a cartridge replaced in our bathtub faucet, but we couldn't get the old cartridge out.  Brittany was kind and helpful on the phone and was able to send someone out very quickly.  Bryan was so polite and friendly and efficient!  He did a fantastic job explaining why it was stuck, what he was doing, and the potential issues they could run into.  They prepared me for the worst but delivered the best!  Completed the whole project, including travel time to get the replacement part, in an hour and a half.  Would definitely recommend Hobbs!!
They arrived at the earliest available and quickly fixed my toilet at a fair price.
Great work, very transparent and VERY professional and reasonable! Would definitely recommend

I called Hobbs Plumbing spoke with a nice lady named Brittany she scheduled me for the same day I called. A very pleasant and knowledgeable young man named Bryan came out assessed our situation. We had a loud noise in our water pipes, I called it  the “dinosaur”. Our house is 30 years old.  He checked our water pressure it was high.  I suspected it was our PRV and it was.  Bryan relocated our PRV near our water meter instead of at our house in the crawl space. I’m very pleased with the service we received. I will definitely  will use Hobbs Plumbing when needed again.

I would like to thank the customer service of Hobbs Plumbing. I had no hot water and the prospects of getting it fixed was a week or longer. I talked with Brittney and she said if she could get someone out earlier she would call me back. Brittney called back and said a technician had finished a job early and would send him out. Bryan arrived and fixed the problem and some others he found. Thank you Bryan for being so helpful and courteous. Would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing if you have a plumbing issue.
J. Givins

"I would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing LLC, to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika/Lee County area. I was out searching for a plumber to do some repairs at a rental property of mine . On my way home about to end my search for that today, I saw a Hobbs Plumbing Van in a stores parking lot . As I pulled into the parking  lot this young man walked out, I explained my situation to him(Bryan), he said yes we can take care of that for you. This company , were professional, diagnosed the problem quickly, and finished the job in a short amount of time. Thank you again Hobbs Plumbing LLC, for doing such a GREAT job.

I would give Hobbs Plumbing one million stars if I could.  Yes, one million! We had an issue at my elderly parents' home.  Setting up the appointment was very easy, thanks to Brittany, who was so pleasant, helpful and efficient.  Brian arrived at their home and the pleasant experience continued.  He was also so nice and professional and got the job done! Trying to find the right plumber to get the job done correctly can be stressful.  Hobbs Plumbing got the job done, with no stress for me.  I'm grateful.
Excellent work highly recommend
We have dealt with Hobbs for our required annual backflow test for many years. He is always very responsive and polite, and the price is reasonable.
Blake was punctual, courteous, and I thought their price was fair. I highly recommend them!!!

I will never have anyone else fix any plumbing related issues at my house ever again other Hobbs Plumbing. I have had to call them multiple times for different things going on in my older house and they have come and fixed everything extremely quickly. Blake has always been very sweet and patient explaining everything to me. He not only found a rare part for my shower due to old pipes but made sure to give me the part info should I ever need another, but his company also came out to my house two days after Christmas to fix a busted pipe as planned but they also fixed my sink as well that they were not told about during the call and showed no irritation with this. So many other times they have come out due to old pipes that they have always gone above and beyond for my family. Highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing for any and all plumbing needs, They are amazing!
Best in town!! If I could give 10 stars I would!

We had a pipe burst on Christmas Day due to the deep freeze...I knew it was going to be hard to find a plumber and I called 5 different places - Hobbs was the only company that could come out the next day!  They send a young man named Bryan who found our busted pipe rather quickly, and then repaired it even quicker.  I could not be more pleased.  Two thumbs up, great experience and great customer service from this company.  Bryan is the man!  This is the only plumbing company I will use in the Auburn area for the foreseeable future!
Called company for a leak repair. Appointment was scheduled easily. Added a couple of other plumbing issues after he came. Additional issues were satisfactorily completed  as well. Fair price.

Fantastic experience.  We were a 1st time customer and they responded immediately and came within 24 hrs to look at the issue.  Not only did they come very fast but they stayed for more than 2 hrs and completely fixed our issue on 100 year old plumbing in Opelika.  Highest possible recommendation!

Blake fixed an issue with a sinking outdoor drainage pipe that was causing backups.  He went out of his way to explain the issue to me and was very communicative throughout the process. I found him and his team to be efficient, professional, and friendly.  I was impressed with the service!

In searching for a local plumber a friend recommended Hobbs Plumbing. After checking out all the 5 star reviews, I gave them a call. The feedback was true, Blake was friendly, professional, knowledgeable, affordable and on-time too! He fixed several plumbing issues at my house efficiently and effectively and I will be calling him again in the future. So glad I found Hobbs Plumbing!
This company deserves AA+++, very responsible, respectful and great service and prices. I would recommend them for all your plumbing needs

Job well done. Polite, kind. And good pricing.
I highly reccomend

Hobbs replaced a pressure reducing valve for our home, and they did an outstanding job. They were very professional, the quality was obvious, and the price was very reasonable. I would highly recommend Hobbs for any plumbing work in Lee County.
I had a small leak in my front yard. They came out in the rain and replaced a section of cracked pipe the same day that I called. This is definitely who I'll use in the future.
Drew came and efficiently replaced a faucet in the kitchen and repaired a faucet in the bathroom.  Quick and the price was very reasonable. I would highly recommend.
I have worked with Hobbs plumbing on numerous occasions.  Blake is always on time and the work is always as it should be.  They do great work at a fair price.  I highly recommend Hobbs plumbing.
Good people
I would recommend Hobbs Plumbing to anyone and everyone. They show up when they say they will and are knowledgeable and courteous. Always a great experience.
Best plumber in the area! He cares about what you have going on and will fix it. We’ve used Blake a few times and can always rely on him! ❤️
Great service professional and friendly outstanding job

I had Blake at Hobb's Plumbing come and and replace all of my old galvanized pipes. He beat 3 other companies with his bid. The crew was on time and finished early. They completely cleaned up after the job as well! They stand behind their work 100%. They are professional, efficent, knowledgeable, polite, and punctual. I recommend Hobb's Plumbing for all of your plumbing needs.
Cannot say enough good about this company! Mr. Hobbs was prompt, professional, and did a great job for an amazing price. Will definitely recommend over and over again.

Prompt and reasonably priced.  Blake called early this morning after I left him a message last night. He came promptly and fixed the drain problem that had been causing my washing machine standpipe to occasionally overflow.  He is now going to be my regular plumber, and I'll use him for a planned new addition as well.
Awesome experience with Hobb’s Plumbing! Got in touch with them yesterday and they were able to fix my issue today! Great service with very reasonable pricing!

Excellent Services. My wife and I had Blake and his team completely redo all of our plumbing and we were completely satisfied. Hard worker with unbeatable pricing. We will always be using Blake for all our plumbing jobs from now on!

I came home from vacation during spring break to a leak in my hot water heater... I called maybe 30 plumbers and none could get me in that day. Hobbs plumbing was working on a job near me and communicated with me all day and even arrived earlier than expected. He took a look at the problem and quoted me a very fair price and became replacing it right then. He even took the time to rip the wet carpet up and set up a fan for me. He also repaired a sink and a toilet I had been having trouble with. I would highly recommend this company for all your plumbing needs. He is great and is a stand up guy!

finalWebsiteData.aboutUs: Cox Plumbing Solutions is a premier plumbing service provider catering to residential and commercial clients in Shelby and surrounding areas. Our team of highly skilled and knowledgeable professionals specializes in a comprehensive range of plumbing services, from water line installations and septic tank systems to kitchen and bathroom remodels. We take pride in our expertise in leak detection, drain cleaning, and emergency plumbing services, ensuring your plumbing needs are met with efficiency and precision.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the ultimate in plumbing excellence with Cox Plumbing Solutions, where our unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction sets us apart.
sellingPoints: Unparalleled expertise: Our team of seasoned professionals possesses in-depth knowledge and extensive experience in tackling even the most complex plumbing challenges.
Rapid emergency response: We understand the urgency of plumbing emergencies and offer prompt, reliable service to minimize disruptions and restore your plumbing system to optimal condition.
Tailored solutions: We take a personalized approach, carefully assessing your unique needs and providing customized solutions that meet your specific requirements.

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: I had issues with toilets and showers emptying. Cox Plumbing was able to get everything fixed. They even came to my house the same day that I contacted them! Great Service!

Had a sudden leak at the main water supply entering the house.  Called Cox plumbing. They were available and arrived within an hour.  They explained the process and had it fixed within an hour.  New line needed from outside through the wall to interior shut off.  Good price and fantastic service.  I’ll definitely use Cox Plumbing again.  Very pleased.

Cox Plumbing  Solutions,  Their Staff is Caring , Professional  & Very Knowledgeable,  they  fix my water heater and they was on time and didn't take long. Highly  recommend  wish they had 10 Stars.
Thank You,
Monica Stalling

Rex was very commutative. His work was excellent. Very polite. I would highly recommend him and his company. If I ever need plumbing work done i would use his company again. And very reasonable pricing. He has gone above and beyond for me to get my plumbing back up to par. Thank Rex for all you done I highly appreciate you.

Rex did an awesome job! I had busted the water supply pipe trying to move my clawfoot tub and he came over to fix it the same day I called when no other plumber would answer the phone. He also went above and beyond what anyone would do and fixed a duct while he was in the crawlspace, put the feet back on my tub, pulled a rag out of my garbage disposal, and removed some dead rats out of the crawl space that he came across =O~. Not only that but he was polite and good with the kids and didn't overcharge. I'll definitely call him when I need something else!

He fixed our bathroom sink that's been leaking for quite some time and was improperly installed but help us with the problem  in a very fast manner and even helped fix  My Father's dryer even. So grateful to have someone close by and affordable to My Father's house and even dependable.  Will definitely recommend his service and continue for my family for future emergencies!
Rex came out late in the evening very promptly to fix our water leak. Quick response time and great work. I would highly recommend his services!

We needed a plumber right away and no other plumber could come til the next morning. I called Cox Plumbing and Rex told me he would be at my house within the next hour.  He kept his promise and fixed our toilet.

I had a tough clog when Ii first got to my home, he worked on it and fixed it.
Very friendly, got the job done immediately and wasn't too expensive. I would recommend him and this buiesness to anyone who needs any help with plumbing. I wish I could give a hundred stars bc he saved the day.... Also I had another company bloww me off bc the job was too difficult but not rex. So 😊
Very fast,respectful and got the job done. Fast and great quality work for lil amount of $$!!
I recommend Cox Plumbing to anyone.  Very professional,  kind, and they do excellent work.  Very trustworthy.  I will definitely use the again
He was amazing and very professional! If I could rate more than 5 stars I would.  He was a life saver tonight!
Rex and his dad have done work for me on several occasions and each time the do a terrific job with a good price for the work.  I highly recommend them for any plumbing job!!!

Rex Cox of Cox Plumbing Solutions has done several jobs for us. We have been pleased with his service each time. He does quality work, cleans up after himself and his prices are very reasonable. We recommend him and will continue to use him as the need arises.

finalWebsiteData.aboutUs: CJ Plumbing and Gas is a licensed and certified plumbing and gas fitting company serving the Alabaster, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in plumbing renovation, propane gas plumbing, repair, installation, and remodeling services. With a focus on quality workmanship and customer satisfaction, we strive to provide exceptional solutions for all your plumbing and gas fitting needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing and gas fitting expert.
sellingPoints: State-certified and licensed professionals ensuring code-compliant and safe installations.
Meticulous attention to detail, leaving your property in pristine condition after every job.
Prompt and responsive service, with a commitment to accommodating your schedule.

fiveStarReviews.reviewText:
Professional, prompt, friendly and informative. Outstanding and innovative work for a fair price. You can't go wrong with CJ!!
.

Carter was recommended by a friend when our water heater went out.   He came the same day and replaced it during the holidays and did a great job!  I appreciated him following up that night to be sure all was good. He was easy to work with and we will definitely use his service in the future.

Carter came highly recommended from a neighbor and friend. He was such a great help to my family in a very tough situation during the holidays. He worked hard to locate a part needed two days before Christmas and succeeded. He showed up earlier than promised, was friendly and very thorough. He was determined to find the root of the problem and provide a solution to have our home back up and running for Christmas with our family. I can’t recommend him enough for your plumbing/ sewer problems. We will definitely reach out to him for any future needs.
Perfect service, very detailed and thorough! Glad we met!

Carter did an excellent job installing a water pressure regulator. Other plumbers gave me a huge quote on installing one and Carter was honest about the cost which was half of what everyone said . Very thorough.

Carter provided a thorough inspection to diagnose the root cause of my issues, provided a quote (which i agreed to), and performed a quality and timely repair.

Excellent customer service! I will definitely use again for any other plumbing needs.

I highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas.

Always a great experience with Carter. Responsive, prompt, informed and willing to make the time, even on short notice (calendar permitting). Prices are fair, work is done right. As a customer, I feel like I am getting good, informed advice. Highly recommend

Absolutely outstanding service from CJ Plumbing! They recently replaced my main water line, and I couldn't be happier with the results. From start to finish, they were incredibly professional, kind, and efficient. The quality of their workmanship is top-notch, and they treated my yard with the utmost care, leaving it as they found it. Remarkably, they even took the time to meticulously restore the grass where they had to dig, leaving no trace of their work behind and you can hardly tell I had my waterline replaced. I highly recommend CJ Plumbing to anyone in need of plumbing services. They truly went above and beyond for me.

Anyone looking for a plumber, I highly recommend giving CJ a call.

Carter was very responsive I reached out to him.  He worked hard and stayed overtime to ensure that all was repaired properly.  The price was fair, and I will use him again the next time we need a plumber.
Great to work with and affordable.
CJ is excellent at troubleshooting the problem.  I trust him to accurately identify and repair the problem.
Very professional and friendly. Will definitely use again.
Great guy, very professional and arrives on time.

CJ plumbing was very helpful. I called with questions over the phone and he took his time to understand my situation and help me over the phone, knowing I wanted to do the work myself. He never hesitated to tell me exactly how to fix my issue and even sent pictures showing me the parts I needed. I would highly recommend CJ plumbing for your plumbing needs.
Carter has worked on several projects with me. Always on time and professional. He is the service to call.

Carter was very nice and professional. He fixed our disposal in a short time and even quickly ran to a hardware store to get a spare part we needed. He was quick to respond and on time. I would recommend him for any plumbing job.
Carter is an absolute gem, we are so glad to know him. All the ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Reviews can’t lie - top notch service!
Exceeded my expectations...Look no further if you want quality, trust and professionalism.
Carter is knowledgeable and reasonable.
It was a difficult fit into a tiny space but they still managed a quality professional installation.

Prompt. Hard worker. Intent on finding the reason for the problem to fix it. Not just patch. Reasonably priced.
Respectful. And even cleaned everything and put things back in their place.
Refreshing and encouraging to find businesses with integrity.
Carter worked at my house.  He was very professional and kind. He took time to explain the work that needed to be done and  why. I highly recommend Carter for your plumbing needs!  He is great.
Carter provided a personable experience. I felt that the interaction was genuine and reasonable.The service was a underground water pressure regulator replacement.
Did a great job,  very reasonable charge.

Also installed vanity top with sink  Carter responds quickly and starts job right away. Always shows up and complete jobs when he said he will. All rare in the current times. Works hard and produces great projects. Always friendly and professional.
Carter was very knowledgeable and not pushy with the repairs. He thought me a lot before and during the process.

Carter found our leak which was not where I thought it was and installed new faucets in our double vanity master bath.  He also checked our gas lines and gas appliances.  Great service.  Fair prices.  Good guy.  What more do you need?
The plumber answered the phone when I called and worked me into his schedule that same day. Work was professionally completed.

We have used CJ Plumbing for both new installation and repair.   He is professional, timely, courteous, and trustworthy.  He is our first call for all plumbing issues, and we highly recommend his services.
Great service, they determined the problem and had a fix in a few hours.
Second time using this company and I highly recommend him. Very knowledgeable and meticulous. If you want it done right call this company.

Had the line heading into my house burst a year ago and Carter came out to fix it.  Just a week or so back I noticed water in the same place.  Carter came right back out, dug the hole, and found the faulty part.  He fixed the problem at no charge under warranty.  He spent two days working it and even found a break further up the line that he repaired.

The man does quality work and stands behind it.  Not sure what else you can ask for.
Great job, I will use Carter again.

I highly recommend Carter with CJ Plumbing and Gas. He came out and fixed some issues for us. He was very responsive and up front with his answers to my questions. He had availability and once he was at our house, was able to fix our issues within an hour. Quality work and very professional. Highly recommend!

CJ installed a gas line for us and we could not be happier. He is responisve, fairly priced, and he communicates thourghly so we had no doubts that the job was done properly and professionally. Thank you for being a rare vendor that knows what customer service is and works hard to provide it.
Great service, would definitely use again

Gas tee and valve installation for natural gas-powered generator.  Carter went an extra mile talking to a manufacturer tech rep to straighten out a generator mechanical issue.  I will call CJ Plumbing & Gas again for my next plumbing or gas need; thanks, Carter!

Carter has been a huge blessing towards our new home purchase. The previous homeowners did a poor plumbing job on the majority of the house and he has helped us out on several occasions so far. I would highly recommend Carter for his expertise in the industry, as well as his honest opinions and pricing. He always goes above and beyond the job. We will be using him for years to come.
Carter came out and fixed our leaky hot water tank. He was very thorough with his work. Very nice guy as well.

Carter was quick to respond, thorough and dedicated in his work, thoughtful about timing and all the particulars that go along with doing work at a school for young children. We have a 1940s building that was pieced together for over 60 years so to say small jobs become big jobs is an understatement. We are so thankful to have an amazing plumber on speed dial!
I would highly recommend C J Plumbing and Gas. Could not have been a better experience, during a stressful time. Carter was so helpful and went out of his way take care of us.
Carter really knows what he is doing; very knowledgeable.

Carter was extremely professional and courteous and prompt. He explained options in a non-biased way and gave me pros and cons of each. He answered any and all questions I had throughout the process and made sure I was comfortable with every decision he made. I would recommend to anyone for any plumbing and gas needs and I plan on calling for my future services.

Carter did an amazing job replacing my main water line. He was the only plumber out of several that we called that located the leak.  He was very proficient, honest and thorough. He explained every step of the process.  He went well beyond the call of duty!  We will definitely use him again and refer to all in need of a great master plumber!  Thanks Carter! It was a pleasure working with you!
Carter came out and worked on our tankless water heater. We thought it was beyond repair but it's working like new now. Very happy with the repair service.
I was very pleased with Carter he was very thorough did a great job will be using his business again if you want your job done right give him a call
I had a gas tankless water heater installed in my basement. I had a great experience. Work was completed timely and at a better price than other estimates I had for the same service.
Carter was very professional. He took the time to explain the repairs he was completing. He worked very clean and was very thorough. I will use him in the future.
Words can not express how much of a hero CJ was to us today. I would 100% reccomend him to ANYONE! The man can get it done and its going to be done correctly.
I’ve used CJ Plumbing for a variety of plumbing issues (bathroom and water heater) and was very impressed with not only the completed work but also by Carter’s thoroughness and honesty.
CJ Plumbing replaced a leaky kitchen faucet and garbage disposal for me.  The job was first class and above and beyond my expectations!  I will definitely call them again!
I can't say enough about Carter. He by far went above and beyond what I expected. If you're searching for someone, I ask you give him a call first.
Great job.

Professional and friendly!  Carter went above and beyond to replace faucets and regulators the RIGHT way and took the extra time to be sure that we would know what to do in a water emergency!!  Will always be our first choice for plumbing and gas repairs!

A stain appeared on my ceiling that was caused by a leaking drain. I
called CJ's Plumbing because of all the good reviews and I'm happy to say the reviews are true. He answered the phone and scheduled the service as soon as possible.
Carter investigated all over the house until he found the source of the leak. He was determined to find the root of the problem and was patient as he searched. He was professional, upfront and honest, and helpful in that he not only fixed the problem, but also provided me with the name of a drywall person that could make repairs to the ceiling.
I could tell he didn't just care about the job, but also about helping people which isn't always the case in some businesses.
I appreciate his integrity and will definitely use his services in the future if I need them. I would definitely recommend him to friends and family.

CJ plumbing and gas came out today to fix a water leak. They were amazing. He was honest and went above and beyond for this job. Carter was professional and extremely knowledgeable, he  explained things very well. After a day from hell they were a breath of fresh air.
Very nice  and honest person. He showed up on time and did a good job.  I will use him again when I need a plumber! Thanks so much!!
Called in to schedule a service call for my gas logs not lighting and they game me a suggestion to try and it worked. Saved me time and money.
Great and quick response.  Very knowledgeable and helpful.   Answered all my questions.

We did a huge house remodel that required rerouting plumbing and gas lines.  CJ Plumbing did a great job and installed new sinks, stops, and fixtures in all baths and kitchen.  We did a floating vanity and Carter installed the sink and it looks amazing.  I would definitely recommend using them!
Great service for installation new water heater and reasonable price too. Would recommend it

Carter was prompt, professional and honest. He made sure our family was safe from the issues caused by the regulator on our propane tank. Carter also fixed the regulator to correct the water pressure issue in our house. I would highly recommend this company!

I would like to leave a positive review for Carter Johnson with C.J. Plumbing and Gas.  I’m my experience, Carter showed great communication, was punctual, very friendly, and his plumbing work exceeded expectations.  I had a great experience and highly recommend.  Thanks again!

Carter was completely professional, honest, and got the job done quickly and efficiently. He was extremely kind and upfront. I highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas and will definitely be using them again for future needs!

Came out on July 5. Most people were off. Showed up and made sure that everything was completely good before leaving.  Completely honest and always has the homeowners best interest in mind.  I would recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas to anyone.  Thanks again for the huge help.

Carter was very professional with both his work and his time. He said he would show up at a certain time and he arrived at that time ready to work. Once started he found the leak, replaced the damaged section of pipe and also helped with another issue relating to a drain line that he noticed.

Carter also took the time to educate me on some best practices, recommending some preventative maintenance and some useful items to own to minimize any future damage. I will be calling Carter in the future for my plumbing needs!

I highly recommend C J plumbing. Carter,the owner,is courteous,punctual and very communicative.The price was reasonable and fair,especially considering the quality of his work. Made double sure there were no leaks before leaving. I’ll use again!!!

I called on CJ to repair a faucet that a “handyman” improperly installed, to locate a leak my painter had discovered, and install a project piece vanity. All services were performed  while I was out of town for work. The tasks were addressed quickly and performed in a highly professional manner and communication was top notch. I will be using this company again to install gas logs and replace some outdated sink faucets and I have no doubt I will be pleased with that work also.

We called CJ and he came within a couple of hours which was much better than the other places we called. He was fast and friendly and reasonably priced. He even took time to talk me through the problem and help me understand how I could keep it from happening again.

CJ plumbing and gas is amazing. This is the kindest most honest man you will meet. He explained everything he was doing and made sure I understood and why it was the best choice. I honestly believe he saved me thousands by going the extra mile and really “digging” to see what the real problem was. I will be using him for all future projects as well as recommending him to all of my friends and family. Thank you so much.

I could not have asked for better service.  He was diligent about making sure the repairs were done right, and future-proofed. He stayed until the job was done,  which went late.  There is no other plumber that i will call again.
Was very thorough in evaluating the work to be done. Took time to explain what needed to be done and why    Was responsive and made sure to get back to us timely.

Woke up yesterday morning to discover a leak was coming water heater which damaged my bathroom ceiling.  Water reclamation service (DryTech) got us in touch with Carter. He got on the phone and told us what we could do prior to him coming out to mitigate any more damage. He got to house around 330 and had everything he needed to replace and/or fix the problem. After asking for his professional opinion, we decided to go ahead and replace the water heater. Keep in mind, it’s now 430ish on a Friday afternoon. He said he would rather go ahead and start the job as opposed to waiting until Monday. In his words, “I don’t want to leave you with a ticking time bomb.”  The entire job took about four hours to complete. Carter didn’t leave the house until 9 or so when it was all said and done.

I don’t know of many companies that would have done what Carter did. He is professional, courteous, clean, and more importantly, trustworthy. I have ZERO issues in using CJ Plumbing and Gas again or referring them to friends and family.

I called Carter about a leaking water heater. He told me he would be at my house by 2:30 PM the same day. He was early, diagnosed the problem and made the repair. He was easy to deal with and discussed all my options and pricing prior to any work. I would recommend CJ Plumbing & Gas to anyone.

Carter is very professional and knowledgeable about what he does, he is very thorough and will go above and beyond to make sure the job is done correctly.
Thank you!
Carter was very thorough and went above and beyond for what he needed to do. He explained a lot of things that I never knew and he is a super nice guy.

Carter has done several plumbing jobs for my family and I since replacing our water heater in 2014.  He's been very responsive, prompt & professional.  He's done quality work at a fair price and has gone above and beyond more than once.  I can do some plumbing jobs myself, but Carter is my first choice when I need any plumbing work done that are beyond my experience or ability.
I am very pleased with My new plumber Carter Johnson.He did an excellent job & gave me some additional advice on a future plumbing job.I highly recommend him!

Carter was prompt and worked me into his schedule quickly. I really appreciate that Carter didn’t just find what was wrong and fix it, he took time to explain the issue to me so I would understand what he was doing to fix it. He even texted the next day to make sure there not any drips in any of the showers he worked on.

We needed our propane fireplace fixed and the work done was excellent. He made sure to get the job done correctly and provide the documentation we needed to get our house sold. So nice and easy to work with.

Carter worked me in on a busy day when my washer hose split from high pressure. He promised not to leave me without water overnight even when I discovered several other problems as a result of the pressure that demanded attention. The job required a late night, but Carter remained positive and on task. I’ll call him again if the need arises.

I highly recommend Carter. He is professional, responsive and gives high quality work. He took the time to not only do the work but explain the process which is extremely important. If you are looking for a Plumber who will go above and beyond, Carter is your guy.

Carter did a great job going over our options to replace our water heater. Once we made our decision he worked us quickly into his schedule and came out to replace our 21 year old water heater and bring it fully up to code. He was very thorough and made sure everything we were wanting was installed and fully working as expected.
Great work.  Stayed until the job was perfect, even when there was a bump in the road.  Great service!
Carter did a great job. I highly recommend him!

We needed a a plumber to come check out an issue that showed up on a home inspection. He was able to come the same day we called. He went far beyond what was expected. I would definitely recommend them.

I definitely recommend CJ Plumbing & Gas. We had an emergency leak right on a holiday weekend and he was at our house within the hour diagnosing and fixing the problem. He was very professional and honest and I believe we will be using him again in the future if needed.

Carter has fixed multiple things in our house, and is reasonable. Thank you for all of your good work. The first time I called, he was there within 20 minutes. I’m pretty sure it was on a Sunday, and we had a leak. Other plumbers told me they couldn’t get to us ASAP, but Carter did. Also replaced water pressure regulator and fixed bathroom leaks.
Prompt, reasonable, professional and great quality.  Carter has always gone above and beyond each time I have called him with plumbing issues.

Carter gave me an honest quote and was very quick to get back to me. I had quotes from 3 other companies and Carter helped save us hundreds of dollars, whereas the other companies kept trying to up sell me. He did a fantastic job too!
Right on time, and VERY reasonably priced! Will definitely use again and highly recommend.
I called Carter Johnson to replace a sump pump. He came out and inspected the problem. Then returned to replace with a new pump the same day...in the rain. Thank you.
Carter knows his stuff.  When you have a plumbing issue and you want it fixed call CJ plumbing and gas.  Thanks for your prompt service.
He went above and beyond anything I had expected. I will  use him for all my plumbing needs.

We highly recommend Carter Johnson and C.J. plumbing and gas.  He is extremely knowledgeable about all plumbing and gas problems and quickly resolves them.  He is honest and kind.  We use him every single time we ever have any plumbing or gas needs.  We also recommend him to all of our friends.

I recently had a leak and when I called Cater came out the same day and completed the repair.  I also asked him to repipe my house and he did that too by himself in two days.  All I have to say is WOW and this is my plumber always. Carter is great and goes above and beyond in his work.
Carter does a great job and takes time to explain all of your options.  Highly recommend!
Outstanding job and service! Carter showed up on time and did everything he said he would do in a timely manner. He was very friendly, knowledgeable and we will definitely be using him again.

The best and most relieable Plumber in Shelby County. Carter thank you so much for everything you did in order to complete my emergency repairs. Please dont hesitate to call this man for any plumbing or gas needs.

Outstanding service and communication! Call Carter for all your plumbing and gas needs! He replaced the wax ring and completely reworked both toilets, checked my water heater and water pressure. Carter even left a curb side key (and picked one up for me to have on hand) and showed me how to turn the water main off because he had an already scheduled pressing job to do first. He is very conscientious and left no mess whatsoever. I will definitely be calling C.J. Plumbing & Gas for all future plumbing and gas  jobs and repairs. Highly recommend!
He was awesome!! Took his time to make sure everything was done well. He was detailed in looking over everything before he got started and throughout the job. We could not be happier.

I had a leaky water heater and I called CJ plumbing. I had gotten his business card from someone at work. He came over and not only inspected the water heater, but thoroughly check the pressure through out  my home. He took the time to explain exactly what was going on. I scheduled a day for him to come and replace the water heater. I recently had surgery and couldn't get around very well. Most of the time that he was here I was in bed recovering. He, was so professional that I was comfortable with him. He, not only did the work he was being paid to do. He went beyond that and tightened a faucet that he noticed was in need of attention.
I am so appreciative that God sent the right person. I  highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas.
Fast and friendly service. Will definitely use again in the future.
Amazing customer service,  no bologna, let’s you know exactly what’s wrong and explains what he can do to fix it.  Carter did an amazing job.  Highly recommend!
Carter did another fine job at our house today by installing a new kitchen faucet. Carter does excellent work and I would be happy to recommend him anytime. Thanks again Carter.

This is the second time we've called Carter about a plumbing problem. The first time he came to fix a water pressure problem. He was very professional and did an excellent job. The second time we called him to fix a clog that was about 35 ft down in our kitchen drain. He was able to clear the clog and made sure it was perfect before he left. I highly recommend him. He has fair prices and does the job quickly and professionally. I will definitely call him again if we have any plumbing  problems or needs.
Came out and and excellent job on our issue! Will use again and recommend him highly!

Mr.  Johnson  went above and beyond what I had expected. He came to my home to fix a major problem and was very thorough in diagnosing and discussing my options. (Water leak in the concrete slab) He was knowledgeable, helpful, and professional. I was impressed that he took his time and checked EVERYTHING! He gave me a price that almost knocked me over BECAUSE it was MORE THAN FAIR. (WAY less than the “national average “ to do that kind of job) not only that AFTER he quoted me the price and did the rather large job he fixed a couple of minor problems for me .....he said “it won’t take but a few extra  minutes and it’s no problem ” (he had already been here for a few hours!)  I will be using him for any plumbing needs I have in the future and I highly recommend him. He is knowledgeable, helpful, reasonable, fair, kind, and the quality of his work is excellent.
CJ is so Awesome. He was on time , he listened to all details if i could give him more stars i would. He really helped me out in my time of need. Thank you so much CJ i HIGHLY recommend him.

Carter came out the same day I called. He took care of all of our problems and I would recommend him over any other plumber company in the area! He is knowledgeable, personable, and makes sure you understand what is happening - thanks again for your service!
Highly recommend
5 Stars
Carter was amazing! He came out the same day that we called and took care of the problem! Definitely recommend him if you are in need of a plumber!

Carter arrived on time and was very efficient. He took time to explain what he was doing and answered all of my questions. Pricing was reasonable and I would definately call him again for plumbing needs.
Did a great job would reccomend !

Carter recently helped us with several plumbing issues. We appreciated his attention to detail. He let us in on what he suspected, and what each possibility might require. Carter was on time, persistent and thorough, and went above and beyond to help us feel confident that we wouldn’t face these same problems again.

If you’re looking for a great plumber at a reasonable price look no further. He did an excellent job with my plumbing needs and was on time and zero hidden charges like most plumbers out there. If you have any plumbing needs do yourself a favor and skip the other hacks and call Carter Johnson definitely won’t regret it

Carter was fantastic!!  I truly can’t say enough great things about him!  His dedication to fixing my plumbing issues and not leaving me without water was very impressive.  The company I first found on the internet was going to wait 6 days before they even came to diagnose the problem.  Carter was here within a couple of hours and stayed until we had water again...into the night! His prices were absolutely fair and he seems like a great guy that I completely trust in my home.  I’ve used him three times since my initial emergency for some plumbing updates and he has continued to impress with every visit!!  I would absolutely recommend him!
Thank you Carter for installing my whole house water filter. You provided excellent service along with beating your competitors price by $115.00. Thank you again.

Carter was excellent to work with! He was right on time and quickly diagnosed my main issue. He openly admitted there *might" be a 2nd issue, but there would be a different need than he could provide (e.g tile work), so he prepared me for that possible next step. Good news - as of 1 month later I have ZERO evidence of any water and Carter's plumbing work saved the day - and I haven't forked over any $$$ for extra tile/construction work!!!
From a value perspective, I don't have any comparable dollars. That said, he was very transparent how he charged and provided a clear bill. I did not at all feel like he took advantage of the job based upon the work he performed and time he spent. He was quite thorough, and seemingly very honest and transparent in his diagnosis and solution, and quite knowledgeable of his trade!!!
On top of his work, he was friendly and courteous. He was dog-friendly and was very affectionate to our sweet Peggy. ♥️
Thank you, Carter, for great work!

We had an absolutely amazing experience with Carter. We had a nasty clog that gave us fits for quite awhile. Carter came by shortly after calling him. He worked for so long on our problem and even worked on other problems he found while working on the initial problem. He was thorough and explained  what he was doing and why which we greatly appreciated. If we ever have another issue, he’ll be our first call. I’d recommend him 10/10 to anyone.
Detailed

Hardworking, HONEST, and dependable, reliable, knowledgeable, professional...I could go on for a while!  Carter quickly responded to my residence due to an under the slab pipe leak (which had water seeping up through my floors).  He thoroughly explained what the "approach and fix" would be and set me up with all the additional help (detection and remediation)I'd need.  He went straight to work on the leak and did not stop until it was fixed.  I would absolutely, highly recommend!

I highly recommend this company. Carter came out to give us a quote and was very professional. We went with him because he definitely knew what he was talking about and was much more reasonable than some of the big name companies. He changed out 30 foot of cast iron rotted pipe over to pvc and replaced pressure reducing valve and installed a new cut off valve. Needless to see, everything is working great now. He is my permanent plumber now.

Philip P
Would give 10 stars if I could. CJ provides quality service with professionalism. Explains and breaks down what the issue is to the customer. Will do work with him in the future.
Carter was prompt and very professional. He did excellent work and it was much appreciated. I will be using him in the future for sure. He will always be at the top of my list. Thanks again Carter!
I highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas. Carter is prompt, does quality work, and offers fair prices. I am so pleased to find a plumber that I can count on and trust.
Absolutely a great  plumber! His work has cut our water bill over half the last few months. We will never call another plumber again.

Carter has been out to our house for a variety of reasons from indoor plumbing to irrigation system issues.  He’s also worked on my parent’s RV plumbing!  He definitely knows what he’s doing, reasonable, and timely.  I’ve recommended him to several friends and I wouldn’t do that if I didn’t trust him and believe he was the best man for the job.

Carter has helped us complete projects in preparation of the sale of our home. Whenever we contacted him about a job, he scheduled us quickly and arrived on time. Carter’s prices are competitive and his work is solid.

We’ve used Carter multiple times in our prior home and our current one. He is professional, reliable, and friendly. He schedules you quickly, all work is done in a timely manner, and he always cleans up after his work is completed. I highly recommend him - you can’t go wrong!

Robert & Lisa Shapiro highly recommend C J Plumbing and Gas Alabaster (Carter Johnson) for any all plumbing or gas repairs or installs. We requested a list of items to be repaired, checked & installed. As with any request for repairs, the list grew once he arrived. Carter was knowledgeable & pleasant with the additional repairs. He worked two solid days to ensure all was in proper working order. Carter is the only Plumber & Gas Fitter we will contact. We are elated with his expertise & excellent customer service.

Called Carter on a Saturday to come take a look at a leak in my ceiling.   He came over in less than 30mins from the call.   After a very thorough investigation, he diagnosed the issue and pointed out some other issues that really needed attention.  He is very detail oriented and very helpful.   He fixed the issues and now I have a house that is in perfect plumbing order.   Thank you Carter for your quick response and an awesome job on my house.   I highly reccomend Carter for any plumbing needs.

Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of services including plumbing, roofing, electrical work, and door replacements. With a focus on quality workmanship and customer satisfaction, we are committed to providing exceptional service to homeowners throughout Huntsville, Madison, Hazel Green, and surrounding communities.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing Huntsville's premier plumbing and home repair experts.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured professionals with extensive knowledge of local building codes and regulations.
Comprehensive range of services from plumbing and roofing to electrical work and handyman repairs, all under one roof.
Commitment to using high-quality materials and employing proven techniques to ensure long-lasting solutions.

fiveStarReviews.reviewText: After being quoted by two well known roofing companies that I needed a new roof,  Raymond was able to find the leak and fixed the problem.  What he thought was initially the problem he later discovered was a short cut the builder had done to the roof and fixed that problem as well.  I would definitely recommend Raymond and would use again.

Built a beautiful deck for our 1958 bungalow. Every old house comes with special surprises; Shamrock upgraded our old porch foundation and redesigned the existing structure to suit our needs, without charging extra for the additional work. We’re so pleased with the results!

Mr. Roop was hired to finish some renovations to several posts on my front porch, back patio, and shed. He did a great job despite several issues that made the job difficult and unique. He remained patient with changes I made mid-way through the job and made several trips to pick up materials needed.  He was very polite and patient and was very flexible with his schedule to accommodate me. He stayed within budget which was very reasonable.

finalWebsiteData.aboutUs: With over 18 years of experience serving the Huntsville area, Anything Plumbing is a trusted local expert in providing top-notch plumbing installation and repair services. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in delivering quality workmanship and exceptional customer service. From routine maintenance to emergency repairs, we handle all your plumbing needs with efficiency and expertise.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing Huntsville's premier 24/7 plumbing solution.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times with our round-the-clock emergency service, ensuring your plumbing issues are resolved promptly.
Highly trained and certified technicians equipped with the latest tools and techniques to tackle any plumbing challenge.
